br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.publisher

Class SituationChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.publisher.SituationChannel

  • public abstract class SituationChannel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a channel for publishing situations of a specific type in a specific SiNoS Service.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new Situation Channel in the specified host and port.

      Creates a new Situation Channel in the specified host and port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SituationChannel

        public SituationChannel(java.lang.String host,
                int port,
                java.lang.Class<? extends br.ufes.inf.lprm.situation.SituationType> situationType)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Creates a new Situation Channel in the specified host and port. The new channel will publish situations only of the specified situation type. Log level is initialized as SEVERE
        Parameters:
        host - Address (URL or IP) of the SiNoS Service that will publish the situations.
        port - Port number of the SiNoS Service that will publish the situations
        situationType - Type of situation which will be published by this situation channel.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Indicates the occurrence of a communication-related exception during the execution of this remote method call.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Indicates that there is no event channel running in the provided host.

      • SituationChannel

        public SituationChannel(java.lang.String host,
                int port,
                java.lang.Class<? extends br.ufes.inf.lprm.situation.SituationType> situationType,
                java.util.logging.Level logLevel)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Creates a new Situation Channel in the specified host and port. The new channel will publish situations only of the specified situation type. Log level is initialized as SEVERE
        Parameters:
        host - Address (URL or IP) of the SiNoS Service that will publish the situations.
        port - Port number of the SiNoS Service that will publish the situations
        situationType - Type of situation which will be published by this situation channel.
        logLevel - Level of logger output. It can be: SEVERE (errors and exceptions), WARNING (warnings and exceptions) or INFO (debug-level output).
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Indicates the occurrence of a communication-related exception during the execution of this remote method call.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Indicates that there is no event channel running in the provided host.

        Parameters:
